about.about_paragraph_1: Welcome to Photo Locations. The app is aimed at all of you who like travelling and photography. I love to see and explore new places but sometimes struggle to find interesting places to photograph when I have only limited time to explore and would still like to come home with some amazing shots.
about.about_paragraph_2: Hopefully this site will prove useful to you as well. You are welcome to drop me a comment over on the Contacts page at any time.
